entry.title: New!!! Luau Body Butter
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Body Butter
Price: 31.99

Dirty Bee | Body Butter

Luau: Tropical fruits and floral blend

Dirty Bee’s Body Butter is handmade of Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Red Raspberry Seed Oil and Coconut Oil.  Our All-Natural Body Butter is formulated to give you the perfect amount of moisturizer that your skin so desperately needs without leaving you feeling oily or greasy.

  • Cocoa Butter: It is an antioxidant powerhouse that reduces stretch marks and scars and used as a rich moisturizer, that helps heal sensitive skin.
  • Shea Butter: Using shea butter on your body, especially your face, can condition, tone, and soothe your skin.
  • Red Raspberry Seed Oil: As a great source of antioxidants and vitamins A and E, red raspberry seed oil can slow the aging process, stimulate collagen production, and help your skin appear more youthful and vibrant.
  • Coconut Oil: provides deep moisture without making your skin oily.

Key Information about our Body Butters:

  • Travel Friendly
  • 100% Vegan
  • Animal Cruelty-Free
  • Reusable Container
  • Mother Nature Approved
  • Gluten Free

Ingredients: Water, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth 20, Flax Seed Oil, Hemp Seed Oil, Fragrance, Sodium Carbomer, Red Raspberry Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol

Made in USA

entry.title: Dirty Bee Burn Butter • Hydrating Relief
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Body Butter
Price: 31.99

Dirty Bee  |  Burn Butter 9oz

Formulated to give you the perfect amount of moisturizer that your skin so desperately needs.  Dirty Bee Burn Butter delivers a soothing natural moisture barrier that will leave your skin feeling the softest its ever been and will help to heal damaged skin caused from harmful UV rays.  Give it a try and see what everyone is raving about with this All-Natural Burn Butter.

  • Cocoa Butter: It is an antioxidant powerhouse that reduces stretch marks and scars and used as a rich moisturizer, that helps heal sensitive skin.
  • Shea Butter: Using shea butter on your body, especially your face, can condition, tone, and soothe your skin.
  • Coconut Oil: provides deep moisture without making your skin oily.

Ingredients: Water, Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Litsea Cubeba Fruit Oil, Grapefruit Oil, Orange Oil, Lemon Oil, Lime Oil, Aloe, Rice Bran Oil, Calendula Oil, Aleurites Moluccana (Kukui) Nut Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Seed Oil.


Made in the USA
